Translations.Text: Yaa Dyvyvsya
Ta Quran tse povno wisdom
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vy (Rashad) ye odni z kur'yeriv
Na pryamomu shlyakhu
Tse vidkryttya ye z Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Shchob poperedyty lyudey chyyi batʹky nikoly ne buly poperedzheni, ta tomu, vony unaware
Tse predetermined shcho bilʹshistʹ yikh ne vvazhayutʹ
Dlya my rozmishchuyemo navkolo yikhnikh kaydaniv shyy, do yikhnikh pidboriddya. Otzhe, vony stayutʹ zamkneni u yikhnʹomu disbelief
Ta my rozmishchuyemo bar'yer pered nymy, ta bar'yerom pozadu nykh, ta otzhe, my yim vuali; vony ne mozhutʹ pobachyty
Tse yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy vy poperedzhayete chy yim abo ne, vony ne mozhutʹ poviryty

Vy budete zvazhatysya na tilʹky tsymy khto uphold tse povidomlennya, ta povaha naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyva - navitʹ koly vyklyuchno u yikhniy tayemnosti. Dayte yim harnu novynu forgiveness ta velykodushnoyi vynahorody
My zvychayno ozhyvemo mertvyy, ta my zapysaly vse vony zrobyly u tse zhyttya, tak zhe, yak i naslidky shcho prodovzhuyutʹsya pislya yikhnʹoyi smerti. Vse my rozrakhuvaly u hlybokomu zapysi
Tsytuyutʹ dlya nykh pryklad lyudey u spilʹnoti shcho otrymav kur'yeriv
Koly my poslaly yim dva (kur'yery), vony disbelieved yim. My todi pidtrymaly yikh treti. Vony skazaly, "My (bozhyy) kur'yery do vas
Vony skazaly, "Vy ne vyhlyadayete bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹki istoty yak ny. Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy ne poslaty vnyz budʹ shcho. Vy brekhuny
Vony skazaly, "Nash Lord znaye shcho my buly poslani do vas
Nasha yedyna misiya musytʹ dostavyty povidomlennya
Vony skazaly, "My roz·hlyadayemo vas pohani oznaky. Yakshcho ne vy utrymuyetesya, my budemo bezsumnivno kam'yani vy, abo afflict vy z bolisnym retribution
Vony skazaly, "Vasha oznaka zalezhytʹ vid vashoyi vidpovidi, zaraz shcho vy nahaduvatysya. Diysno, vy porushuyete lyudey
lyudyna prybula z inshoho kintsya mista, kazhuchy, "O moyi lyudy, sliduyutʹ za kur'yeramy
Sliduyete "za tsymy khto ne prosyte vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty, ta keruyetesʹ
Chomu ya ne mushu obozhnyuvaty khto vystupyv z initsiatyvoyu meni, ta yomu musytʹ ye vashe ostatochne vidshkoduvannya
ya 'Budu vstanovyty bilya bohiv Yoho? Yakshcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy willed budʹ-yaka shkoda dlya mene, yikhnye zastupnytstvo ne mozhe dopomohty meni kozhnyy kusav, ne mozhe vony ryatunok meni
U takomu vypadku, ya by buv povnistyu astray
ya viryv v vashomu Lordu; budʹ laska poslukhayte meni
(Pid chas yoho smerti) vin buv kazanyy, "Vnosyatʹ Ray." Vin skazav, "O, ya by khotiv, shchob moyi lyudy znaly
Shcho miy Lord prostyv meni, ta zrobyv meni pochesnyy
My ne poslaly vnyz na yoho lyudey, pislya yoho, soldativ z neba; my ne potrebuvaly poslaty yim vnyz
Vse tse vzyalo odyn udar, whereupon vony stilled
Yak zasmuchenyy yavlyaye soboyu umovu lyudey! Kozhnyy chas kur'yer poyikhav yim, vony zavzhdy ridiculed yo
vony ne dyvylysya skilʹky heneratsiy my vynyshchyly pered tym, yak yim, ta yak vony nikoly ne povernuly yim
Kozhnyy odyn z nykh budutʹ sklykatysya pered tym, yak ny
odyn znak dlya nykh yavlyaye soboyu mertvu zemlyu: my vidnovlyuyemo tse ta produktsiyu z tse zerna dlya yikhnʹoho prodovolʹstva
My rostemo u tse park palʹm daty, ta vynohrad, ta my vyklykayemo pruzhyny khlynuty tam
Tse musytʹ zabezpechyty yikh z fruktamy, ta shchob dozvolyty yim vyroblyayutʹ z yikhnimy vlasnymy rukamy shchob ni vony potrebuyutʹ. Vony by buly vdyachni
Slava musytʹ khto utvoryv vsi riznovydy zavodiv z zemli, tak zhe, yak i sebe, ta inshi stvorennya shcho vony ne navitʹ znayutʹ
Inshyy znak dlya nykh yavlyaye soboyu nich: my usuyemo daylight zvidty, whereupon vony ye u temryavi
komplekty sontsya u spetsyfichne roztashuvannya, z·hidno z proektom Mohutnʹoho, Omniscient
misyatsʹ my zamyslyly z'yavytysya u étapiv, do tse staye lyublyatʹ staryy vyhnutyy sheath
sontse nikoly ne spiymaty z misyatsem - nich ta denʹ nikoly deviate - kozhnyy z nykh plavaye u yoho vlasniy orbiti
Inshyy znak dlya nykh shcho my perevezly yikhnikh predkiv na navantazhenykh ark
Todi my stvoryuvaly ti zhe dlya nykh shchob yikhaty
Yakshcho my willed, my mohly potopyly yikh, tak shcho yikh by ne krych pochuti, ne mohly vony budutʹ vryatovani
Zamistʹ tsʹoho, my yim zlyvy z myloserdyam, ta dozvolyayutʹ yim polyublyayutʹ dlya deyakoho chasu
Dosi, koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, "Doviduyutʹsya z vashoho mynulyy, shchob popratsyuvaty righteousness dlya vashoho maybutnʹoho, shcho vy mozhete dosyahnuty myloserdya
Niyaka materiya yakyy riznovyd dokazu dayetʹsya yim z yikhnʹoho Lorda, vony stiyko disregard tse

Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, 'Dayutʹ z BOZHYKH umov vam,' tsey khto disbelieve skazhete tsym khto vvazhayutʹ, 'Chomu musytʹ my dayemo tsʹomu komu BOHU mohly zhyvlennya, yakshcho Vin tak willed? Vy diysno daleko astray
Vony takozh skladna zadacha, "Koly shcho obitsyanka bude prybuvaty do propusku, yakshcho vy budete ye pravdyvi
Vsi vony dyvlyatʹsya budutʹ odyn udar shcho overwhelms yim, v toy chas, yak vony dysputuyutʹ
Vony ne budutʹ navitʹ maty chas zrobyty budutʹ, ne budutʹ vony vmiyutʹ povernutysya do yikhnikh lyudey
rih bude dutysya, whereupon vony budutʹ braty pochatok u seryoznyy ta budutʹ ity do yikhnʹoho Lorda
Vony skazhutʹ, "Prykroshchi do nas. Khto resurrected ny z nashoyi smerti? Tse ye shcho naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyve poobitsyalo. Kur'yery pravo
Vse tse vizʹme odyn udar, whereupon vony sklykayutʹsya pered tym, yak ny
Na shcho denʹ, niyaka dusha ne bude obrazhatysya u naymenshyy. Vam budete platytysya akuratno dlya shchob ni vy
dwellers Rayu bude, na shcho denʹ, happily zaynyatyy
Vony perebuyutʹ z yikhnim podruzhzhyam u krasyviy tini, polyublyayuchy zruchne vbrannya
Vony budutʹ maty frukty tam; vony budutʹ maty budʹ shcho vony bazhayutʹ
Pryvitannya myru z duzhe Myloserdnoho Lorda
Yak dlya vas, O vynuvati, vy budete vidkladatysya
I ne domovlenistʹ z vamy, O Dity Adam, shcho vy ne budete obozhnyuvaly chorta? Shcho vin vash naybilʹsh revnyy voroh
Ta shcho vy budete obozhnyuvaty Meni yedynyy? Tse yavlyaye soboyu pravo shlyakh
Vin pryzviv do pomylky bezlich vas. Vy ne ovolodily budʹ-yakym rozuminnyam
Tse yavlyaye soboyu Peklo tse bulo poobitsyane dlya vas
Sʹohodni vy spalyte u tse, yak naslidku vashoho disbelief
Na shcho denʹ my opechatayemo yikhni hyrla; yikhni ruky ta nohy budutʹ davaty svidchennya do vse vony zrobyly
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo vualʹ yikhni ochi ta, otzhe, koly vony shukayutʹ shlyakhu, vony ne pobachatʹ
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo zamerznuty yim na mistsi; otzhe, vony mozhutʹ ni zmina misʹtsya napered, ni idutʹ nazad
Whomever my dozvolyayemo prozhyty dovhyy chas, my perekhodymo yo do slabkosti. Vony ne rozumiyutʹ
Shcho my navchyly yoho (kur'yer) ne poeziya, ne vin (poet). Tse ale formidable dokaz, ta hlybokyy Quran
Shchob propoviduvaty do tsykh khto ye zhyvyy, ta expose disbelievers
vony ne pobachyly shcho my stvoryuvaly dlya nykh, z nashym volodiyemo ruky, domashna khudoba shcho vony volodiyutʹ
Ta my pidkoryly yikh dlya nykh; deyaki vony yidutʹ, ta deyaki vony hostyatʹsya
Vony oderzhuyutʹ inshyy maye vyhodu z nykh, tak zhe, yak i napoyu. Vony ne by buly appreciative
Vony zdiymayutʹsya bilya BOHA inshi bohy, mozhlyvo vony mozhutʹ buty dopomohy yim
Navpaky, vony ne mozhutʹ dopomohty yim; vony zakinchuyutʹ sluzhachykh yim yak prysvyachene soldatam
Tomu, ne budutʹ zasmuchenyy yikhnimy vyslovamy. My znayemo tsilkom vse vony prykhovuyutʹ ta vse vony zayavlyayutʹ
lyudsʹke isnuvannya ne dyvytʹsya shcho my utvoryly yoho z tiny krapli, todi vin povertaye u revnoho voroha
Vin pidnimaye pytannya do nas - toy chas, yak zabuvayuchy yoho vykhidne stvorennya - "Khto resurrect kistky pislya vony mozhutʹ hnyly
Kazhutʹ, khto zapochatkuvav yikh u pershu cherhu bude resurrect yim. Vin znaye tsilkom kozhne stvorennya
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto stvoryuye dlya vas, z zelenykh derev, palyvo kotryy vy horyte dlya svitla
ne khto utvoryuyetʹsya nebo ta zemlya spromozhna recreate ta zhe? Tak diysno; Vin yavlyaye soboyu Creator, Omniscient
Vesʹ Vin potrebuye zrobyty vykonaty budʹ-yaku komandu musytʹ skazaty tse,," ta tse
Tomu, slava musytʹ u chyyiy rutsi yavlyaye soboyu suverenitet nad vsima rechamy, ta yomu vy budete vertatysya
